summary: This document appears to be a transcript of an interview or deposition with an individual named Ms. Noel, who worked at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The interview focuses on her being asked to sign a training sign-in sheet for SHU (Special Housing Unit) training she did not actually attend, at the request of a supervisor, to satisfy program review requirements.

persons.name: Ms. Noel
persons.context: The primary person being interviewed. She describes being asked by a supervisor to sign a SHU training sign-in sheet dated June 26, 2019, despite not having attended the training due to being out on an injury.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: A supervisor (lieutenant) at the MCC who asked Ms. Noel to sign the SHU training sign-in sheet without providing the training, stating it was needed for program review. She is no longer at MCC and is now at a facility in New Jersey.

connections.description: The lieutenant was Ms. Noel's supervisor at the MCC and directed her to sign a training document she had not completed.

events.title: SHU Training Sign-in
events.description: A sign-in sheet for quarterly SHU (Special Housing Unit) training dated June 26, 2019. Ms. Noel's signature appears on it, though she states she did not attend the training.

events.title: Interview Regarding Training Documentation
events.description: An interview is conducted with Ms. Noel, focusing on irregularities in training documentation, specifically her signing for training she did not receive.

locations: New Jersey (where the lieutenant transferred to)
keyFacts: Ms. Noel, a former MCC employee, was asked by a supervisor (a lieutenant) to sign a SHU training sign-in sheet for June 26, 2019, despite not having attended the training.
Ms. Noel was out on an injury at the time of the training. The supervisor stated the signature was needed 'for program review.'
The supervisor who requested the signature is no longer at the MCC and has transferred to a facility in New Jersey.
The document is part of an interview or investigative process examining procedural irregularities at the MCC.
